name: Dwor
description:
I was inspired by the growth of wordle to create a word game. I made it as a part of Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. However, I only could work on it for 2 days out of the 7. Overall I'm happy with the results but I feel like it could be more polished. The UI is spaced weirdly because it went weird when I built the version but I didn't have the time to fix it.

The rules of the game are simple. The end of a word is the start of the next but you can't have repeating words. The aim is to get the highest score possible, enjoy!
